title: FS: 14 ungraded T206 cards with HOF'ers
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: FS: 14 ungraded T206 cards with HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
For sale individually, as follows.  Price is for check or money order, shipping included - add 3% for Paypal (normal - I don't do 'gift').  Inquiries by email, using contact member feature.  Most, if not all, have creasing, but on some it is extremely minor.  I think pricing is fair, so if you offer me something lower and I do not respond, it means I'm waiting to see if I get my asking price - I will respond when it sells or if I accept your offer.

  * Adkins - $30
  * Cassidy - *SOLD*
  * Dessau - $28
  * Dunn - *SOLD* ('Jack' at top front
  * Egan - *SOLD* (pencil writing on back
  * Hall - $30
  * Jackson - $27
  * Nichols - $35
  * Poland - $33
  * Slagle - $22
  * Strang - $27
  * Mcgraw - *SOLD* (2 pinholes)
  * Keeler - *SOLD* (paper loss on back, trimmed at top
  * Bresnahan *SOLD* (pencil writing residue at top back, and bottom front right border
Scott, I'll take Keeler.  It's a present for a friend in Ontario.  Needs to get there in 7 days.

[quote name="dog*dirt" post=1351416]Do you ship to Canada?[/QUOTE]

Hahaha.  Yes, of course Andrew.  But you would have to pay actual postage and send a notarized statement in advance, that if anything weird happens to the package, you don't require a refund.

Dunn and Keeler are sold.

Bresnahan as well...see last post.
Would you take $75 for Bresnahan and McGraw?
Bob, Bresnahan is sold; however, I don't do deals publicly.  Send an email and we can talk.
Mike, I'm still looking for an email from you.

Mike - got yours.
Larry - still nothing.  I think you are trying to communicate with the incorrect member - I don't use PM, and no emails have arrived.

[quote name="runscott" post=1352593]mike - got yours.
Larry - still nothing.  I think you are trying to communicate with the incorrect member - i don't use pm, and no emails have arrived.[/quote]

just sent another one

Larry - there must be some issue with your email.  There is nothing in junk and I have received a couple of emails today from Net54 members, so that's working fine.

I'm going to add the available ones to my store (see link below) and anyone can purchase via checkout and Paypal.  I'll get that done by tomorrow morning.

Mike - never received your payment, so that one is still available.

Mike, payment received - thanks.

Larry, I still have not received any emails from you and I check my junk folder regularly.

*Cassidy is sold*

*Egan has left the building*

Plenty remaining.  I am also open to offers on any of my T206 ebay cards under belltownvintage cards, or on my website (at website below).
Crazy amount of ink splatter on the back of the Mcgraw.  Good prices.  Good luck with the sell.

[quote name="Tao_Moko" post=1354641]Crazy amount of ink splatter on the back of the Mcgraw.  Good prices.  Good luck with the sell.[/QUOTE]

Yeah, I guess I should have called it a 'T206 Error' and gave it it's own page. :)


...and McGraw is gone
